1.content: What girl do you want Agnes to tickle?
1.title: Choose a girl

choices: Agnes tickles her till her navel glows red!
111.content:
Tayla has long brunette hair, blue eyes and a pretty smile. She is around average height for her age. She is wearing denim shorts and a cut off white t-shirt that shows off her flat, smooth, pale belly and her incredibly ticklish, innie belly button.

Tayla was heading out for a party, she wasn't sure where to go, so she left early. She was using her mobile's GPS to get where she was going, however, it was taking her past a retirement village that would lead her in the wrong direction.

When she got to the retirement village, she took a look around to see if her GPS was accurate.
"Excuse me, dear" called out the elderly voice of a woman. Tayla looked up to see a short, old lady making her way over to her.
"Could you help me? I've lost my cat somewhere in my home". Tayla questioned it in her head, but nether-the-less followed her to her place.

Inside her house was clean and tidy, not a single thing out of place. Tayla looks around the room as the elderly lady drips some baby oil onto her index finger. Tayla turns around to cop a finger in her delicious navel. The elderly woman wiggled her finger in the teen's button, causing her to laugh and squirm.

Tayla's belly button was already ticklish enough, the baby oil pushed her to breaking point. The elderly lady had her hand under Tayla's butt, to hold up the almost fallen teen, while still invading her delicate innie.
"Please, not my belly button!" she cried in her laughter.
111.title: Tayla

1112.content:
Tayla fell to the ground, as Agnes came down with her, carefully getting onto her knees. Despite this, Agnes was still wiggling her finger in the teenager's belly button. Tayla's hips were locked between Agnes' legs, she couldn't even squirm. Tayla's belly button began to glow red as Agnes continued to torment her victim.

"I'll do anything, please just stop!" Tayla tried to spit out, in-between her laughing fits.
"Anything?" Agnes asks, withdrawing her finger from the tired teen's navel. Agnes leaned back, crossing her arms and thinking about that offer.
"I want you to be tickled!" Agnes says, digging her finger back into Tayla's belly button.

Despite it being deep, Tayla's navel wasn't wide enough to fit Agnes' stubby finger, the rim of her belly button perked up and sat around Agnes' finger.
Tayla could feel Agnes' finger touching the depths of her innie, twirling the knot within around in circles, and pushing on it. She couldn't take much more and decided to act.

With what strength she could muster, she pushed Agnes, only slightly putting her off balance. Tayla's hips were free and she rolled over to take off from her captor.
Tayla got onto her hands and tried to push up, but was brought up to her knees by the surprising strength of the creepy elderly lady. Agnes put her arm around Tayla's torso, holding her tightly in place.

She knew it was coming and braced for it, but even still, she was startled when Agne's other index finger entered her belly button. Her finger was cold, as opposed to the other that had been seeking refuge in her belly button. Agne's finger was stiff, as the room was cold, but still performed well in tickling her prey.
Tayla's innie was beginning to pulsate as the her knot was being poked and twirled with again.

"If you be a good girl, I'll let you go. If you try anything silly again, I will tickle your little belly button forever." Agnes said, leaning into her whilst pressing deeper into her navel.

Tayla had to make up her mind, she thought of a good plan to try and escape, but if she failed, she probably wouldn't ever make it out, but he could also of just taken the tickling.
1112.title: Belly Button Torment

112.content:
Chloe is a 19 year old girl who volunteers at a nursery home. Her hair is naturally red, and is long enough to reach her mid back. Chloe's skin is neither tanned nor pale, but a balance between. She loves to show off her beautiful body, but at the moment she is wearing nursing scrubs.

One night, 10 minutes before her shift ends, Chloe is approached by Agnes. The young woman always felt that Agnes had preferred her in some way. Feeling at ease in the presence of the kindly old woman, Chloe opened up to her and engaged in small talk.

"Yes, maam. I still have a few years left in college." Chloe smiled warmly.

"Ah, I see." Replied the old woman. After a pause, she asks in her rough, weathered voice: "Chloe, my dear, I have a question for you."

"Yeah?"

"Can you lift up your shirt for me?" The question stunned Chloe greatly. She wasn't sure if she should be angry or surprised at this point.

"Ummm...."
112.title: Girl 2

113.content:
Stacey is a 16 year old girl. She has long brown hair, blue eyes, a pretty face and a body that draws her a lot of attention.
She is wearing faded jeans, white sneakers and a red crop top, showing off her smooth, tanned belly, and her pierced innie belly button.
She decides to get out of the house and go out for the day, not knowing just how busy it is.

Walking along the street, Stacey wondered why is was so busy. Everyone seemed as if they were in a rush to get somewhere, they were arrogant and often barged their way through each other without saying sorry. Stacey was getting annoyed with the traffic on the footpath, so she started looking around for a shop she could go in. Stacey crossed the road and stood before what looked like an abandoned shop, it was painted black and had poorly painted on, grey writing at the top, reading; 'Mystic Land'. Although she wasn't really into mystic stuff, she felt an explainable attraction to the shop, and decided to enter it.

The shop smelt of strong incense and was dimly lit, with the only light coming from the tinted door. Stacey looked around as she walked to the back, unable to control her desire to look around.
"Hello dear, how may I help you on this fine day?" said an unfamiliar voice, startling her. Stacey looked over her shoulder to see an elderly lady standing right behind her.
"Oh hey, I'm just looking thanks" Stacey said with a smile.
Before she could turn back around, the elderly lady reached into the pocket of her beige pants, and pulled out a necklace. Stacey's eyes lit up at the sight of it, and she turned her body around to face her.

Stacey's heart raced at the sight of it, realising that, that was what the strange attraction was, the necklace. She didn't think why, or how, instead she thought about getting the necklace.

"Could I interest you in this, darling?" the Elderly lady asked, as she slowly swung it left and right, watching as Stacey's eyes followed.
"I.. I don't have any money" she said, still following the necklace.
"It's not money I'm after, sweetie" Stacey's eyes then fixed onto the lady's.
"What do you want then?" she asked with desperation.
"I just want to tickle you, that's all" the Elderly lady replied, as she ran her index finger along her exposed midriff.

She giggle and stepped back. Stacy didn't like to admit it, but she was incredibly ticklish, but she hated to be tickled. She looked at the necklace once again, before looking at the lady's wrinkled old fingers. If she is quick enough, she could grab it from her hand, head for the door and most likely lose her in the crowd, or she could endure what was expected to be a short tickling, and then get it the right way...
113.title: Stacey

choices: The lady fingers her belly button more!
The lady chooses another spot to tickle!
1131.content:
Stacey's desire for the necklace overwhelmed her morality, plus she didn't really want to be tickled. She grabbed onto the necklace, and with all her speed and strength, pulled it from her hand. The chain slipped out of her hand easily, to both Stacey and the old lady's surprise. Stacey ran for the door, and pushed against it, but it was locked. She continued pushing against the door, in hopes that it would just open, but her desire seemed to die down, and she looked down at the necklace in her hand. Her morality was coming back, and she realised that she made a huge mistake, and that she should give it back and apologise.

Before Stacey could make any actions, she felt eight fingers probing at her sides. Shocked, Stacey raised her arms out and looked down at her belly, before the ticklish sensation hit her. She squirmed her hips and laughed, trying to pull away from the lady, but she was surprisingly strong. The Elderly lady wrapped her arms around Stacey's waist, and moved her to the away from the door, to avoid being seen. Stacey was about to open her mouth and say something, but was stopped by a finger wiggling its way into her belly button. Stacey bursted out into hysterical laughter, as a wrinkled finger wiggled around in her navel. The lady put her head against Stacey's side, and looked as she continued to toy with her tickle pit even more.

Her belly button was deep, but had a small circumference. She was incredibly ticklish on every little detail of her navel, but mostly at the bottom of it. This was taken advantage of by the Elderly lady, who had the tip of her finger pressed hard against it, while moving it around with her wiggles. Stacey couldn't take much more of this, she tried prying the hands off of her belly, or just pulling the finger out of her belly button, she tried pushing and kicking her away, but was too weak. She now realised that she would have to take the tickling, with hopes that the lady will stop fingering her navel, and move on.

12.content:
Rose's parents anniversary is today and they are going to the Bahamas for two weeks. Her grandmother is going to be staying with her, until they get back. They leave around three in the afternoon, and tell her "grandma will be here shortly".
An hour or so later somebody knocks on the door. Rose gets up from the couch to open the door, for who she thinks is her grandma. When the door opens Rose finds that its a different old lady, "who are you?" She asked. The old lady leans forward to Rose's face, "I'm Agnes, a friend of your grandmothers. She couldn't make it right away, so she sent me to keep an eye on your for a while". Rose sees no reason not to believe her, so she lets Agnes inside.

choices: Agnes adds her other hand to the tickling.

Rose hears the lock on the door click, and imediatly turns around. As she does so, Agnes moves towards Rose and pushes her onto the sofa. "You look so tired and worried, Mandy you should sit down a while", she told Rose after pushing her. Agnes then sits next to Rose, she looks more nervous than ever, wondering what this old woman was about to do with her. Agnes was staring at Rose's navel, "I know just the thing to take your worried mind off of things for a bit." Rose wasn't interested in finding out. All she wanted to do was run, but was too weirded out to even get up. Agnes doesn't waste her chance, she grabs Rose by her hips and digs into her belly with her thumbs. Rose bursts with laughter, "Ahahahahahahahahahaha Ahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha Ahahahahahahaha, cut it out! Ahahahahahahahahahaha!!!".
She squirmed and kicked violently to try and stop the tickling, after about fifteen minutes Agnes stopped. Rose then imediatly tied to get off the sofa and make a run for it, but Agnes started tickling again and it was all too much for Rose. She fell right back onto the sofa, and now Agnes had Rose's hands pined down with one hand and tickled her belly with the other.
After around twenty minutes, and Rose completely exhausted and to tired to even atempt escaping, Agnes went for Rose's belly button. Ahahahahahahahahahaha Ahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha stop, stop, stop, stahahahahap! Pleeeeeeeaaase, not my navel!!!!!!!!" Rose cried out.

13.title: Danielle

131.content:
"I'm so tired...." Danielle sighed.

She went to the park in order to jog a little bit. Like all 16 years old girl, she was afraid to become fat and wanted to have a great body. That's why she was jogging. She stopped a little bit and drank some water. She grinned when she saw a guy about her age staring at her body with a smile on his face. She knew she had a pretty body and she liked to show it. She was a dark-haired girl with a delicious tanned skin. Her shorts was showing her longs legs. But the best part of her body, according to her, was her flat tummy. She loved it and was always wearing tank top that stopped just above her belly button.

Danielle decided to stretch a little bit, which cause her yellow tank top to reveals her navel a little bit more. She saw a very old woman coming next to her. She frowned. Why would a old granny like her would come to the park alone? The woman stared at her and then decided to talk to her. She was ugly with her wrinkled face but didn't seem naughty.

"Excuse me, sweetie. My name is Agnes and I'm a little bit lost."

The dark haired girl noticed the southern accent that indicated her she wasn't living here and smiled.

"What can I do for you?"

"Could you tell me where the train station is?"

"Of course!" Danielle replied. She showed the place on Agnes' map with her finger.

"I have to thank you!"

"Oh, it's okay, don't worry..."

"I insist." The old lady smiled. "I see you like sports. Do you know that all the stretching you've done are bad for the body?"

"Really?!" Danielle was surprised.

"Good thing I am here. I'm going to massage you and you'll feel better!"

Danielle sighed. Her mother was the owner of a bookshop and she asked her to take care of customers while she was buying "VERY IMPORTANT" things.

She didn't really like to be there. She wanted to hang out with her friends like every 16 years old girl. Besides, she was sure her mother pretented to buy books etc. just for her to keep the bookshop : She wanted her daughter to be more responsible and serious and she thought the bookshop was a good way to do it.

Danielle stretched herself. She looked at her appearance on the mirror and smiled. She saw a well-propotioned girl with a nice tan skin and a skimpy yellow shirt that showed her flat tummy and pretty innie. Her legs were showed too thanks to the denim shorts she was wearing. Then, the door opened and she turned around to see who was coming. It was a very old woman with gray hair and a wrinkled face. The dark haired girl decided to be nice and came to her.

The woman looked at her body and a creepy smile came accross her quite ugly face. Immediatly, Danielle thought she shouldn't have talked to her.

132121.content:
"Listen," Danielle replied, "even if I- did enjoy being tickled, I have to get home soon. My madre is needs help making dinner and-" The woman held up her hand.

"Come on you young latina. Just come with me to my house for a little bit and you'll have a great time. I know you'll enjoy it." The wrinkled face of the woman smiled. Danielle deep down knew she wanted to be tickled, but did she really want this woman to tickle her. She gulped and slowly nodded.

"Okay." She whispered. The old woman smiled.

"Great, now just follow me to my car and we'll have a great time." She squeezed Danielle's side which made her burst out into giggles. "A great time." And so Danielle got into the old woman's car and buckled up as the drove off. She had butterflies in her stomach as they drove to a rural house in the middle of no where. The house was a modest 2-story house and as she walked in she saw that the house was surprisingly clean.

"Follow me bonita." The old white lady said gesturing forward with her finger. They went to the center of the house which had a closet. Danielle's eyes widened as the old woman with surprising strength lifted up the floor which revealed a hidden staircase and basement. The underground basement was built with stone and had plenty of bondage gear.

"Its like a dungeon." The young latina girl said. The woman nodded.

"Yes." They walked over to a small table in the center of the room. "Please lay down." The old woman said patting the table. Danielle hesitated and gulped. But she eventually nodded and laid down. The table was wood, it was cold and hard and her legs hanged off the end table. Danielle didn't say anything as the old woman picked up some shackles and walked back over to her. She felt her hands shackled above her and her ankles and legs shackled to the legs of the table.

"Now lets tickle that pretty belly of yours." The woman said. Danielle giggled as the woman slowly ran her hands over her soft and smooth belly.

"Ohgah-hahahahahah-nonononoahaahha!" She yelled as the woman's long nails started to scratch her toned belly. Her belly convulsed as she laughed and gasped for breath. The woman ran her nails down her ribs and tummy in long strokes which drove Danielle crazy. "Ahhnono-ahahahahahahahahahaha!" She yelled as the nails ran over her swarthy skin. The nails ran across her belly fast and hard. Her belly became red as she was mercilessly tickled for half an hour.

"Gootchie-goo, is bonita ticklish." The woman said as she lower her mouth and gave Danielle a raspberry.

"Hahahahahahaha!" Danielle screamed.

"Look's like someone really likes to be tickled." She said as she squeezed Danielle's sides. She bucked and arched her back in a bid to escape the ticklish torment, but she couldn't. "Do you like to be tickled?" She asked and her ribs and sides were raked. "Come on tell me. And tell the truth!"

"Haha-ye-hahaha-yes!" Danielle replied. The woman paused.

"See bonita." She said in her southern accent. "You enjoy being tied and tickled.' She lightly grazed her nails across the teenage latina's tummy, making her squirm and giggle. "Don't you."

"Y-yes." She replied giggling.

"Good." The woman said. "Now." She put her index finger into her belly button. Danielle cried out as arched her back, making it worse.

"Hahahahahaha-ahahaha-ple-pleaahahahaha-ohgah-ahahahaha!" She squirmed, twisting on the hard table. But she couldn't escape. The woman took her other hand and tickled her tummy and sides making it worse. "HAHAHAHAHAHA-PLEASE-AHAHAHAHAHAH-IAHAHACANTTAKEITAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!" Finally after an hour she was shown some mercy.

"Its so much fun tickling your pretty belly. Its so soft and smooth." She said grazing her nails along Danielle's midsection. Danielle kept laughing for a few seconds and had to take deep breaths to compose herself enough to talk.

"Okay, okay." She said taking deep breaths. "That was torturous. But I have to head home now." She said motioning to her shackles.

"Leave, I'm afraid you won't be leaving this house, or even room, for quite some time sweetie." The old woman said putting on an evil smile.

"What!?" Danielle yelled. "You tickled me, but I have to get home!" She shook from fear and the woman started to rub her belly.

"I'm afraid you'll be staying her bonita. You're my new tickle slave." She evil grin became even bigger.

"What!? I'm not your slave you witch! I'm a free girl with freedoms! You don't owe me. I'm a human-!" The woman just walked over to her and with quite a bit of strength hand gagged the young latina. The woman giggled.

"You sacerficed your freedom as soon as you were strapped down to that table." The woman said. "I own you know. You're not a human anymore, you. Are. My. Property. You are my tickle slave" She said the last part sternly before removing her hand.

"You witch! My mother isn't going to just ignore my dissapperance." The old woman let out a cackle.

"Little chica, you see....."

Jessica was a really pretty girl with her long blonde hair and her perfectly tanned skin. She knew other girls were quite jealous about her appearance but she didn't really care. Today was a sunny day and she decided to go to the beach with her best friend. At the beach, Jessica chose a place to lay down, away from peoples. She liked it when guys were staring at her perfect body, but now she just wanted to take a sunbath peacefully. He friend went to buy some ice cream and she let her alone.
So, Jessica lay down on her towel and enjoyed the warm of the sun. She closed her eyes and smiled because she really liked the beach. But she heard an unknow voice and opened her eyes.

"Hello my dear... Are you enjoying the sun?" An old woman asked. She had a southern accent which indicated to Jessica that she wasn't living here. The woman was at least 80 year old because she was gray-haired. She wasn't really pretty with her wrinkled face without any make-up but she didn't seem bad. That's why Jessica decided to be nice.

"Yes, I love it!"

"You should be carefull, sweety... The sun is the enemy of the skin. Especially young and soft skin like yours! Do you want to become ugly later?" The old woman said.

"Errm... No.." stammered Jessica, staring at her wrinkled face and imagining having the same later. The thought was scary for her who just loved her appearance.

"Hopefully, I am here! Look : I have sunblock for you!"

"But I already put sunblock on my body..." Jessica protested.

"This one is very special, you know..." The old woman said with a rather creepy smile.

The more she thought about it, the creepier it sounded.

Here was an absolute stranger that offered to apply lotion on her smooth and somewhat tan body. Of course, it was free, but Jessica did not like the idea of being rubbed all over by an old crone no less, in front of a wide audience. The mere thought made her skin crawl. If it were anyone else than her, she'd have accepted. A cute boy of her age? Absolutely. A toddler? Why not. A hideous old beldam? Out of the question.

"I'm sorry," Jessica interrupted, refusing to meet the kind old lady's gaze, "but like I said, I've already put lotion on my body and I wouldn't want to overdo it on my skin. Thanks, but no thanks. I can deal without it." With that being said, she folded her beach towel in half and packed her belongings. Jessica had planned to stay under the booming heat for a while, but she didn't want to remain with the aged stranger's company - she was stupendously disturbing her. Even with her back turned, Jessica could feel the woman glaring daggers behind her.

Said person was not having it with the young lady's attitude and snapped, grabbing Jessica's arm and prompting her to drop all her stuff on the sand. "It's not very nice to turn your back on an elder, especially one who just offered you expensive suncream." Her voice was void of any emotion.

Jessica shot her a horrifying look as the woman skillfully twisted her arms behind her back like a trained soldier. Jessica's heart skipped a beat once she realized how vulnerable she was and attempted to elude the old bag of bones by sprinting forward. "H-HELP! SOMEBODY HELP ME!" she shouted at the top of her lungs, hoping to get a passerby's attention. "I'm afraid I can't let you do that, sweet-cheeks. It's just you and me," the old woman whispered in her captive's ear.

Jessica's mind raced with overwhelming thoughts, mainly fears of what the old dame was planning to do. Her heart pounded once she spotted the repulsive woman's long fingernails emerge from behind, dangerously hovering close to her bare quivering stomach. 'No, it can't be...she's not planning to...!'

"That's a lovely tummy you have there, dear," the cackling captor complimented, slithering her palm over Jessica's belly like a snake. The youngster frantically giggled at the tickling digits brushing her tender spot, but it looked like the woman was going to do more than just lightly graze her fingers on her stomach. "Oh yes, very nice and soft. To be young again. You and I will have a lot of fun together."

Jessica didn't like the sound of that, but as she was about to shout her defiance, her tormentor's hands wavered over the virgin territory of the blonde's lower tummy, which just so happened to be madly ticklish. She sucked her midriff, but that didn't get her far - the fierce lady's fingers were on array, gently stroking Jessica's hips and triggering blissful, hysterical laughter from the poor teen. The long nails had a dire effect with Jessica's sensitivity.

"Tickle, tickle..." And with those words being pronounced, Jessica's torment commenced.
1422.title: Jessica refuses to hear more about it

143.content:
It was a sunny day as Jessica was waiting for her friend Samantha.

"Omigod, like, what is taking her so long?" Jessica said to herself.

Just then a very old woman [Agnes] walked by, looking at Jessica.

"Hot day, ain't it hon?" said the old woman in a southern accent.

"Uh, yeah..." said Jessica. The old lady smelled pretty bad and Jessica wasn't happy that she was standing so close.

"Ooh! Look at that tummy!" said Agnes as she ran a wrinkled hand down Jessica's bare tanned tummy, making it flinch.

"Hehehehe hey!" giggled Jessica.

"Ticklish are ya?" said the old lady as she reached out a wrinkled hand and groped Jessica right in the middle of her tummy and squeezed there.

"EEP!" Jessica squealed and jumped up.

"A pretty young girl showin' off her tummy is just askin' for a good ticklin'! " said Agnes as she put both her gnarled hands on Jessica's tummy and began kneading and squeezing it.

"Yer tummy is so nice and soft, dear!" said the old lady with glee.

"EEEYAHAHAHAHA! OMIGOD STAHAHAHAHAP!" Jessica pleaded as she moved the old ladies hands away.

"Now I'm gonna play with yer tummy button!" said the old lady as she reached over her old hand and wiggled her index finger into Jessica's deep innie and began wriggling her finger around inside it.

"AAAAAH! NOHOHOHOHO! AHAHAHAHAHA!" Jessica laughed and pushed the old lady's hand away.

"That was fun! Now you go on now and have fun, y'hear?" said the old lady as she patted Jessica's tummy and walked off.

Jessica was speechless.

"Umm, Jessica...?" said a voice that Jessica heard behind her.

Jessica turned around and found Samantha.

"Omigod, Samantha where were you!?" asked Jessica.

"I saw that whole thing... What was that about?" asked Samantha.

"Um..." said Jessica, not knowing how to explain what happened, and hoping to forget it forever.

The End
143.title: Street

choices: Jessica is forced to complete all 3 sets to escape the torture!
144.content:
Late at morning, Jessica and her friends go to their next class, Physical Education. All the female students went inside the girl’s locker room to get changed into their appropriate attire. Gently banging her head against the metal locker, she sighs, “Oh no! I lost my key to open my locker; the teacher will kill me!” Instead of memorizing her locker combination, Jessica traditionally uses a lock that can only be opened by a key. Without it, she cannot access her gym clothes inside. There is a spare key at home, but class is about to begin in four minutes.

Next to her, a friend sends her worries away, “Don’t worry! I heard there is a sub today. They don’t care about what you wear.”

Relieved to hear the news, she hides her belongings into her friend’s locker for safety. Before she leaves the locker room, she glares at her reflection in the mirror. Is what she is wearing really going to be ignored? She wears a provocative pink tank top with straps that reveals most of her tummy and partially her breasts. She wears blue shorts that is only a few inches longer than her underwear. Her shorts is slightly pulled down to where one can see a margin of her pink underwear. Lastly, she wears a pair of white shoes.

Nothing can be done; she goes to class along with the other students. When everyone gathers in the middle of the gym, her friend is correct that there is a sub today. The sub is a very old lady that appears to be in her 80’s. It’s normal for retired teachers to become substitute teachers, but this woman seems like she could collapse at any moment now.

After taking the attendance, the lady, whose name turns out to be Agnes, instructs the class to start stretching, beginning with the hamstrings. Scattered in a circle, the students sit with their legs extended in front of them, toes pointed up, and arms reached towards the toes.

Meanwhile, Agnes, the temporary sub, keeps a close eye on Jessica. The blonde haired girl must have some nerve to come to gym class while dressed up like that. Regardless, Jessica is quite flexible; her head is practically inches away from her legs.

Throughout the rest of the class, the younglings, separated into teams, played volleyball. Few minutes before the bell rings, the students return to the locker room to get changed. Coincidently, Agnes halted the blonde girl, “Hold up, Jessica. I need to have a word with you.” The old lady gestures the girl to come closer.

Terrified, Jessica obediently walks up in sweat, “W-what is it?” Nothing ever good happens what a teacher gestures you to speak to you.

“Do you not have your gym clothes?” Agnes questions her.

“I do, but I lost the key to my locker,” She prays that it is a good enough excuse for her to be pardoned.

“Rules are rules. Wearing such clothing to school in generally is inappropriate. You have two choices. Either I inform the vice-principle to call your parents, or you may redeem yourself right now with me.” The older woman exclaims maturely.

Absolutely no way would Jessica want her parents to find her in trouble at school. What sort of redemption does the woman mean? The choice seems obvious for any rational student, “I’ll redeem myself.”

“Go grab a mat over there,” The sub points towards the blue folded mat that leans against the wall. While the girl does so, Agnes walks towards the fountain to splash her hands in water.

Jessica unfolds the mat and drops it on the ground. When the sub returns, she tells the girl to lie on her back.

“Put your hands behind your head and do three sets of ten abdominal crunches,” Agnes orders.

Jessica held her head with her hands and tried to raise herself up. Her head managed to come up a little, but she couldn’t bring her entire upper body up. Coming back down, she repeats.

Drips of water drops from Agnes’ wet hands; the fluid lands upon Jessica’s smooth and tender tummy. “No, no! Your whole body needs to come up.”

“I… can’t,” Jessica tries her hardest to bring herself to do a crunch. Collapsing back down, she takes some breaths.

“Here, let me assist you,” Releasing her deep urge, Agnes’ hands rubs on top of the girl’s tummy like squishing dough. Water is massage all over her entire tummy.

Meanwhile, when Jessica feels her tummy being touched in any sort of way, she exhales in an uncontrollable giggle, “AH! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Her body twitches and squirms, rolling her body to the side, “S-Stop… hahahaha! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!”

Just as Jessica cannot control her laughter, Agnes cannot control her hands anymore. The urge is too strong; she must continue tickling the girl and hear those crying laughter. “Jessica, stop squirming around and get back to those abs crunches,” Agnes rolls the girl on her back again then she sits above the girl’s lower hips. The itching hands nuzzle on her exposed tummy.

The tickling forced the girl to lunge her upper body forward, completely her first crunch, “AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! STOP IT!” Her hands desperately try to push the woman’s hands off her.

“We can’t stop. You still have nine more to go for complete the first set.”
144.title: Gym Class!

145.content: Where do you want her to be tickled?
145.title: Other2

info.brief_description: Stories about an 85 year old lady who likes to tickle pretty girls tummies.
info.description:
These are the characters:

Agnes - 85 year old lady with an ugly wrinkled face with no make up, pale, skinny body and curly gray hair.

She's from australia and has an australian accent and the girls are from california.

All girls are 16 years old..

Rose - Short red hair, black tank top and jeans, and pale skin.

Danielle - Short black hair, yellow tank top that shows her tummy, denim shorts, and she has tanned skin.

Jessica - Long blonde hair, pink tank top that shows her tummy, denim shorts, and she has tanned skin.

There's also the option to create your own.

All girls are most ticklish on their tummies and belly buttons, and Agnes is not related to any of them and has no grandchildren.

Rules: No sex, violence or tickling anywhere but the tummy and belly button.

Also no tickling tools [such as feathers] or bondage. The old lady also has short fingernails so she doesn't tickle with her nails.
